meteringrange: EV 0-20 (at 73Â°F/23Â°C with EF 50mm f/1.4     USM lens, ISO 100)
isospeedrange: ISO 100-6400 (in 1/3-stop or 1-stop     increments) ISO 100-3200 set automatically Extension settable (with C.Fn.I-3-1): ISO 50 (L), 12800 (H1), 25600 (H2) High Tone Priority settable: ISO 200-6400
shutterspeeds: 1/8000 to 1/60 sec., X-sync at 1/200 sec. 1/8000 to 30 sec., bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range     varies by shooting mode)
exposurecompensation: Manual: Â±2 stops in 1/3- or 1/2-stop     increments (can be combined with AEB)
drivemodes: Single, Continuous, and Self-timer     (10-sec. or 2-sec. delay)
externalflashsettings: Flash function settings, Flash C.Fn     settings
picturestyle: Standard, Portrait, Landscape, Neutral,     Faithful, Monochrome, User Def. 1-3
settings: Auto, Daylight, Shade, Cloudy, Tungsten     Light, White Fluorescent Light, Flash, Custom, Color Temperature setting
productname: EOS 5D Mark II Digital SLR Camera Body     without Lens
recordingfunctions: With the WFT-E4A attached, image recording     to the CF card and to the USB external media connected to the WFT-E4A     will be possible as follows: (1) Standard (2) Automatic switching of recording media (3) Separate recordings according to image-recording quality (4) Recording images having the same size
erase: Single image, check-marked images or all     images in the CF card can be erased (except protected images)
mirror: Quick-return half mirror (transmission:     reflection ratio of 40:60, no mirror cutoffwith EF600mm f/4L IS USM or     shorter lenses)
afassistbeam: When an external EOS-dedicated Speedlite     is attached to the camera, the AF-assist beam from the Speedlite will be     emitted when necessary.
shutterlagtime: Vertical-travel, mechanical,     Electronically-controlled, focal-plane shutter 1/8000 to 1/60 sec.,     X-sync at 1/200 sec. 1/8000 to 30 sec., bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range     varies by shooting mode) Soft-touch electromagnetic release 10-sec. or     2-sec. delay Remote control with N3-type terminal. (Wireless remote     controller RC-1/RC-5 can also be used.)
aelock: Auto: Applied in One-Shot AF mode with     evaluative metering when focus isachieved Manual: By AE lock button
colortemperaturecompensation: White balance correction: Â±9 stops in     full-stop increments White balance bracketing: Â±3 stops in full-stop increments Blue/amber direction or magenta/green direction possible
remotecontrol: Remote control with N3-type terminal.     (Wireless remote controller RC-1/RC-5 can also be used.)
shootingmodes: Still photo shooting and video shooting
protection: Single images can be erase-protected or     not
camerausersettings: Register under Mode Dial's C1, C2 and C3     positions
powersaving: Provided. Power turns off after 1, 2, 4,     8, 15 or 30 min.
interfacelanguages: 25 (English, German, French, Dutch,     Danish, Portuguese, Finnish, Italian, Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish,     Greek, Russian, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Romanian, Ukraine, Turkish,     Arabic, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean and     Japanese)
battery: One Battery Pack LP-E6 AC power can be supplied via AC Adapter Kit ACK-E6 with Battery Grip     BG-E6 attached.
compatibleimages: JPEG and RAW images Only JPEG images can be transferred as wallpaper on the personal     computer screen
recordingmedia: CF Card Type I and II, UDMA-compliant CF     cards, via external media (USBv.2.0 hard drive, via optional Wireless     File Transmitter WFT-E4A)
recordingformat: Design rule for Camera File System 2.0
filesize: (1) Large/Fine: Approx. 6.1MB (5616 x 3744     pixels) (2) Large/Nomal: Approx. 3.0MB (5616 x 3744 pixels) (3) Medium/Fine: Approx. 3.6MB (4080 x 2720 pixels) (4) Medium/Normal: Approx. 1.9MB (4080 x 2720 pixels) (5) Small/Fine: Approx. 2.1MB (2784 x 1856 pixels) (6) Small/Normal: Approx. 1.0MB (2784 x 1856 pixels) (7) RAW: Approx. 25.8MB (5616 x 3744 pixels) (8) sRAW 1: Approx. 14.8MB (3861 x 2574 pixels) (9) sRAW 2: Approx. 10.8MB (2784 x 1856 pixels) Exact file sizes depend on the subject, ISO speed, Picture Style, etc.
filenumbering: Consecutive numbering, auto reset, manual     reset. Possible to create new folders and select folders in the CF card
focusingscreen: Interchangeable (Eg-D: Grid lines, Eg-S     [point of Focus], Eg-A standard focusing screen provided
imageformat: Still Image: JPEG, RAW (14-bit, Canon     original), sRAW1, sRAW2, RAW+JPEG Video: MOV
focusing: Quick mode (Phase-difference detection) Live mode/Face Detection Live mode (Contrast detection) Manual focusing (5x/10x magnification possible)
dustdeletionfeature: (1) Automatic sensor cleaning (2) Manual cleaning of sensor (3) Dust Delete Data appended to the captured image
afpoints: 9 AF Points (1 Cross Type) + 6 AF Assist     Points
focusingmodes: Auto, One-Shot AF, Predictive AI Servo AF,     AI Focus AF, Manual focusing (MF)
autowhitebalance: Auto white balance with the image sensor
selectedafpointdisplay: Superimposed in viewfinder and indicated     on LCD panel
meteringmodes: Evaluative metering with the image sensor     (still photos) Center-weighted average metering (video)
printableimages: JPEG images compliant to Design rule for     Camera File System (DPOF printing possible) and RAW/sRAW images captured     with the EOS 5D Mark II
lowpassfilter: Fixed position in front of the image     sensor
viewfinderinformation: AF information (AF points, focus     confirmation light), Exposure information(shutter speed, aperture, ISO     speed, AE lock, exposure level, spot meteringcircle), Flash information     (flash ready, flash exposure compensation, High-speedsync, FE lock),     Image information (Highlight tone priority, monochromeshooting, maximum     burst, white balance correction, CF card information),battery     information
displayformat: Single image, Single image +     Image-recording quality/shooting information,histogram, 4- or 9-image     index, magnified view (approx. 1.5x-10x), rotatedimage (auto/manual),     image jump (by 10/100 images, index screen, byshooting date, by folder),     slide show (all images/selected by date/folder)
maximumburst: JPEG (Large/Fine): approx. 78 (CF)/approx.     310 (UDMA CF) RAW: approx. 13/approx. 14 (UDMA CF) RAW+JPEG (Large/Fine): approx. 8 (CF/UDMA CF)
